feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to Add a New Tab in ESS Portal for Time Event (Punch In/Out)
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I am working on Employee Self-Service (ESS) in SAP Portal and I want to add a new tab in the ESS overview for Time Event, where employees can view and record Punch In / Punch Out times.

Here’s what I have done so far:

  1. Created a Web Dynpro ABAP Component (Z_HRESS_TIME_EVENT) with:

    • From Date / To Date input

    • Punch In / Punch Out buttons

    • Table showing history of time events

  2. Exposed it as a Web Dynpro Application (Z_HRESS_TIME_EVENT_APP) in SE80, which runs perfectly when tested directly.

  3. In LPD_CUST, I created a new folder under the same Role / Instance as other tabs (Working Time, Personal Information, Benefits) and added my application there.

Problem / Question:

When I log in to the ESS Portal, I do not see my new tab. I understand that the Portal shows tabs via iViews and role assignments.

I want to know:

  • How can I create an iView for my Web Dynpro application and assign it to the ESS Role / Workset in the Portal?

  • Can this be done without Portal Admin access, or do I need someone with admin rights?

  • Are there best practices for adding Time Event tabs in ESS overview for punch in/out functionality?

Any guidance, example steps, or references would be very helpful!

Thanks in advance.

#SAP #ABAP #WebDynpro #ESS #SAPPortal #EmployeeSelfService #LPD_CUST #FPM

entry.title: EWM capacity check - Putaway
entry.content:
Hello,

We are enhancing the system to enforce max pallets per bin.

For example, for storage type TYPE1, we want to allow only 3 pallets per bin. The logic is: Check the bin capacity when an incoming Handling Unit (HU) is being placed.

If the bin has partial pallet then incoming HU will be repacked with existing Partial pallet or for a full pallet, the HU is assigned normally ( added not repacked).

is it possible to implement it via capacity check BADI ?

Please advice Thanks!

entry.title: BAdI Sorter in SAP BTP ABAP for custom BAdI Definition
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Recently we've been developing solutions in SAP BTP ABAP environment, and we would like to create some custom Business Add-in (BAdI) and hook its BAdI definition inside our code for customer extension.

It looks good so far, until we came with a question, how to define the sequence for these BAdIs implementation?

In On-Premise world, we used the good old BADI_SORTER but seems like it isn't permitted to use in BTP ABAP environment. Even if it's allowed, I think it is still using the classic elements like dynpro screen, function modules, ... which isn't following the modern strategy from SAP when developing in cloud environment like BTP ABAP.

I've been exploring a bit on the Internet as well as SAP published documentations for SAP BTP ABAP. Unfortunately, I couldn't find any other options to enable sorting of custom BAdI implementations.

Does anyone have any ideas, how to control the sequence of BAdIs in BTP ABAP?

Thank you very much.

Best Regards,

Tan

entry.title: SAP ChaRM TOC for released & modified
entry.content:
Hello SAP,

I have created a ChaRM with the Transport Request along with two TASKS for multiple users. I have released my Task, but the other Task is in modified status with User2. So, how can I create a TOC with my task only?

ERROR: Cannot create test transport for request; there are open tasks. 

EXAMPLE: 

  • Transport Request: DA1K490700
  • Task1: DA1490701 (Released) { user: Tech }
  • Task2: DA1490702 (Modified) { user: Func }

Basis Technology ABAP Development

entry.title: Smartform print and print preview problem
entry.content:
Hi experts,

Now I have seen a few posts wherein smartform print preview display is not the same as the print display. However, I didnt get a solution which I could use for my case.

The output of the print preview is coming as expected.

However, while printing, the output is not giving the expected result. As it can be seen from the screenshot, the underline  for 'Hard License' text is coming with gaps. Also the entire font seems to be different.

As per the previous threads, I already had a word with the BASIS consultant, and he said that there isnt anything he can do to help me. The print preview output is displayed from SP01 and it is marked as 'Completed'. 

I also checked the printer configuration in SPAD but I am not sure how to proceed with this issue. Since the print preview is working fine, I dont think that there is any coding issue here. What can I do to resolve this ? Please let me know if any other information is needed from my end.

Regards,

Manish

entry.title: Error in cross entity derivation for BP (USMD_RULE_SERVICE_CROSS_ET)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I have a requirement where based on the relationship data entered by user during CR creation, I need to make an additional entry in relationship entity( BP_REL) and also update two custom fields in BP_CENTRL entity.

When the user create an entry in relationship tab in NWBC and press enter, i am using this  method IF_EX_USMD_RULE_SERVICE2~DERIVE of BADI USMD_RULE_SERVICE_CROSS_ET to read the changed entity 'BP_REL' and create an additional entry based on it but getting a dump due to error populated in standard method do_data_check->check_data.
I am getting this error after using WRITE_DATA method and it is resulting in ST22 dump- CX_USMD_WRITE_ERROR
Error message is USMD1A 061.

Kindly could you please help what could be the issue?

entry.title: Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .
entry.content:
Hi All,

Below is my oData URL and when executing from /IWFND/GW_CLIENT

/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_project_v3/srvd_a2x/sap/project/0001/WBSElement?sap-statistics=true&$top=2

I am getting the below response:
{
"error" : {
"code" : "CX_PARAMETER_INVALID_RANGE",
"message" : "Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .",
"@SAP__common.ExceptionCategory" : "Client_Error",
"details" : [
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_INTERNAL_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA97133877F61116",
"message" : "In the context of Data Services an unknown internal server error occurred",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_ENTITY_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA9739C53C899155",
"message" : "Error occurred while processing property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' of entity with index 1",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_PROPERTY_ERROR/005056A509B11ED1BF822D2D09173A04",
"message" : "Property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' has invalid value ''",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
}
],
"innererror" : {
"ErrorDetails" : {
"@SAP__common.Application" : {
"ComponentId" : "PS-ST",
"ServiceRepository" : "SRVD_A2X",
"ServiceId" : "API_PROJECT_V3",
"ServiceVersion" : "0001"
},
"@SAP__common.TransactionId" : "A2E9BF5D760A0070E0068F0DD38A7ACB",
"@SAP__common.Timestamp" : "20251016161510.514754",
"@SAP__common.ErrorResolution" : {
"Analysis" : "Use ADT feed reader \"SAP Gateway Error Log\" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details",
"Note" : "See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)"
}
}
}
}
}

Did anyone faced this error and please let me know how to resolve this error?

Thanks,

BK

entry.title: OData Services ABAP RESTful application programming model
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

I’m working on the S4D400 exercise where we create a subpackage  ZS4D400 and copy the table  /LRN/S4D400_APT to our own package.

However, I noticed that my main package S4D400 doesn’t exist in my ABAP environment.

Should I create this package manually, or is it supposed to be pre-delivered by the system?

I need some suggestions how to find that package. so that I can create the application.

Thanks in advance
Sumanth.

entry.title: Setting that indicates if UI labels come from DDIC or not
entry.content:
Hi.

For selection texts in reports it is possible to configure if the label displayed on UI comes from the DDIC or not.

I would like to know, if it is possible to get this information of an UI element in ABAP.
So, is a parameter configured like that or not.

I already inspected the screen structure but could not find an appropriate field that indicates where the label comes from.

BR

entry.title: Update new pricing after changing pricing condition record
entry.content:
Hello all,

Currently I am facing an issue that, I do an enhancement in USEREXIT_XKOMV_BEWERTEN_END to insert a new pricing condition into XKOMV table.
The copy works fine, however, from user expectation, some of the value should be updated. But this only happens if we access to VA02 manually, and click Update Pricing => G for specific item.
The update won't happen automatically in the background after copying.
Is there any way that I can do the update pricing = G in the USEREXIT_XKOMV_BEWERTEN_END?

Thank you for your time!

entry.title: REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY
entry.content:
Hello,

we have this issue "Number of entries" counter is not showing in the initial screen for  IW39, IW29, IH06, IH08 etc. After clicking refresh button it is appearing.

It is in function module REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY. 

When we check code, data are already there but as was mentioned not shown on initial screen. 

Is there any customizing setting?

entry.title: 403 Forbidden Error in BTP ABAP Trial Environment — Request Blocked by UCON
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

From the last 4-5 days i am facing the below issue: 

I  have connected BTP Trial account to Eclipse ADT. I don't have access to SAP GUI. While previewing the service url I am getting this error. I am frustrated from the last 4 days. Stuck to only this. can you please give me an appropriate solution. I have deleted the BTP trial account and generated a new instance still not resolved, even I have created a new workspace in Eclipse that also doesn't solve the issue. Previously I used to see the preview of the app and service url. I have attached the error screenshot below. Note: My BTP Trial account is still active. I'm using BAS and it's working perfectly.

entry.title: Check capacity - Putaway
entry.content:
Hello !

I’m new to EWM and I work as an ABAP developer.

My requirement is to transfer stock ( Hu ) from one bin to another. For example, if the source HU has a quantity of 250, and the destination bin already contains : one full pallet (150) and one partial pallet (100)

we expect that 50 units will go into the partial pallet to make it full. The remaining quantity should either stay in the same bin (if the bin can hold up to 3 pallets) or be placed in another bin. To achieve this, I’m implementing some logic in the capacity check BAdI, and I’m trying to create an ad-hoc product warehouse task (WT) directly inside the BAdI. Can anyone please advise if this approach is correct or even feasible? 

Thanks!

entry.title: Get name of identifier
entry.content:
Hi,

how can I get the name of an identifier in ABAP?

 

DATA my_variable TYPE c.

DATA identifier_name TYPE string.

" fictive example
identifier_name = get_identifier( my_variable ).

" identifier_name should contain value my_varibale

 

Unfortunately I couldn't find any appropriate solution using RTTI.

 

BR

entry.title: Get information of actual parameters
entry.content:
Hi,

is it possible to retrieve information of actual parameters (arguments) in ABAP?

In my use case I want to know the identifier of the passed actual parameter of a method call.

Example:

...
METHODS do_anything
  IMPORTING
    parameter TYPE string.

...

METHOD do_anything
  DATA(name_of_actual_parameter) = get_name_actual_parameter( parameter ).
  " name_of_actual_parameter should contain as value my_variable
ENDMETHOD.

...

DATA my_variable TYPE string.
do_anything( parameter = my_variable ).

BR

entry.title: Get information of UI elements of dynpro / selection screen
entry.content:
Hi.

I need information of all existing UI elements in a dynpro / selection screen.

I need to know about selection parameters, select options, blocks, everything that is displayed on the UI.

As far as I can see the FM RS_REFRESH_FROM_SELECTOPTIONS and DYNP_VALUES_READ return only information about parameters and select options, but not about comments or blocks etc.

BR
